content: Investments Savings AMA 1M65 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Nov 2018What is the percentage of salary you saved and invested, ever since you started doing so?1 answerAnswerBump0

Loo Cheng Chuan, Founder at 1M65 MovementLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 07 Nov 2018I am aware that personal finance experts provide such a guide for different profile of people, but I do not subscribe to a hard and fast rule. I think it is more important to inculcate a habit of thrift and saving. Once you appreciate the power of compounding, you will realise that every $1 spent could be $10 in the future, you will naturally become more thrifty and would want to invest the money instead of spending it.0 comments0
